sourcesContent:
import React, {useRef, useState} from 'react'; import "../styles/detail-tour.css" import {Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from '../assets/images/ava1.png' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const reviewMsgRef = useRef('') const [tourRating, setTourRating] = useState(null) //static data const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id); //destructure properties from tour object const {photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) // format date const options = {day:'numeric', month:'long', year:'numeric'} return <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ('Not rated') : (({reviews?.length}))} {address}
{city} {price} /per person {distance} Km {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

setTourRating(1)}> 1 setTourRating(2)}> 2 setTourRating(3)}> 3 setTourRating(4)}> 4 setTourRating(5)}> 5
{ reviews?.map(review => (
Muhib

{new Date('06-01-2023').toLocaleDateString("en-US", options)}

5
Amazing place with a lot of historical sites!
)) }
}; export default TourDetails;
